name: Sky Chasers (itch) (Ruben Tipparach)
description:
Inspired by real events and tales of anomalous sitings. Immerse yourself in the experience of UFO encounters from the perspective of a pilot.

Controls:

KeysFucntionW,A,S,DControls the plane (mainly for IR mode).TABSwitches between flight and IR mode.Mouse PositionWhile in flight mode, flies the plane.CRotate camera in flight mode.Left Mouse IR zoom level 1.Left Mouse + Right MouseIR zoom level 2.ESCPause/ExitR,FIncrease/Decrease Jet Speed

Brought to light by:
Ruben Tipparach - Programming /Design
DragonSage- Music/Audio

Flight Controller by Why485: https://github.com/brihernandez/MouseFlight
